wikipedia_page.main: Ann Mroz MBE  is a British-Polish journalist, former editor of Times Higher Education and former editor and digital publishing director of the TES (Times Educational Supplement).

link_mentions.page: Times Higher Education World University Rankings
response: Commenting on Times Higher Education's decision to split from QS, former editor Ann Mroz said: "universities deserve a rigorous, robust and transparent set of rankings – a serious tool for the sector, not just an annual curiosity." She went on to explain the reason behind the decision to continue to produce rankings without QS' involvement, saying that: "The responsibility weighs heavy on our shoulders...we feel we have a duty to improve how we compile them."
